title: Bloomberg Markets: GOP Health Bill Adds $70 Billion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: GOP Health Bill Adds $70 Billion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steven T. Dennis Senate Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Senate Republicans’ revised proposal to replace Obamacare that would provide an added $70 billion to stabilize insurance exchanges over a decade compared with an earlier version. Tom Schramski, President/Managing Partner at Vertess, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
